title: Cute bear icon in store on OCE
body: Is there any reason the cute bear is not in the icon store on OCE but the last few days has been in the store on Russia Turkey and EUW

replies.body: I am pretty sure it or was for sale in all regions except OCE
only OCE remaining but it is not there for whatever reason
no but seriously I check every other day hoping to see it on OCE

Umm, the question is: Why did you migrate your account so many times?


Are you a gypsy?

oh nononono
I just have 6 accounts
I have my main on NA and it's available over there for sale, too.
